-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Compressive Sampling Matched Pursuit (CoSaMP) algorithm as presented in Needell and Tropp's 2008 paper http://arxiv.org/abs/0803.2392.
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/augustunderground/cosamp#readme</a>
@package cosamp
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Compressive Sampling Matched Pursuit (CoSaMP): Iterative signal
--   recovery from incomplete and inaccurate samples" by Deanna Needell
--   &amp; Joel Tropp
module CoSaMP

-- | Compressive Sampling Matched Pursuit (CoSaMP)
cosamp :: Matrix Double -> Vector Double -> Int -> Int -> Double -> Vector Double

-- | DCT Type II where corresponding matrix coefficients are made
--   orthonormal
dctOrtho :: Matrix Double -> Matrix Double

-- | Inverse DCT Type II where corresponding matrix coefficients are made
--   orthonormal
idctOrtho :: Vector Double -> Vector Double
instance GHC.Show.Show CoSaMP.CoSaMPState
